name: starlight-auth-starter
title: Starlight Auth Starter
desc: Control who can access your content by adding auth to your Starlight site.
article:
The Starlight Auth starter provides you with a simple auth setup to control who can access restricted pages in your Starlight site. This template is perfect for building internal documentation, a paid course, a client portal, etc.

Features

  • Deploys to Vercel, Netlify, and supports traditional Node.js deployments.
  • Uses Auth.js to quickly configure authentication providers.
  • Add custom logic to control who can access each page.
  • Use all your favourite Starlight features to build a powerful documentation site.
